title: Vegetation Fire Threshold Classification
text: fiRetools R package version FireTools vegetation fire status tool. Using vector data fire history, vegetation type look-table fire attributes (Maximum/Minimum burn intervals), can produce maps vegetation status, well timeseries analyses area within class, associated landscape metrics.

what: Create template and region of interest (ROI) rasters in an output directory based on input vector ROI, resolution and projection. — createDomain
title: Create template and region of interest (ROI) rasters in an output directory based on input vector ROI, resolution and projection. — createDomain
text: Create template region interest (ROI) rasters output directory based input vector ROI, resolution projection.

title: Create template and region of interest (ROI) rasters in an output directory based on input vector ROI, resolution and projection. — createDomain
code: createDomain(domain, res = 100, proj, outdir, quiet = TRUE, overwrite = TRUE)

title: Create template and region of interest (ROI) rasters in an output directory based on input vector ROI, resolution and projection. — createDomain
text: domain SpatVect SimpleFeatures object contianing domain analysis.  contains multiple features, aggregated. res Resolution, project units, output template mask rasters. Defaults 100. proj Projection (CRS) object template mask rasters produced, epsg string eg. "epsg:3308". none provided, use projection input domain. outdir Output directory write rasters quiet Write progress diagnostics (TRUE/FALSE) overwrite Overwrite files (TRUE/FALSE)

title: Create template and region of interest (ROI) rasters in an output directory based on input vector ROI, resolution and projection. — createDomain
Create template and region of interest (ROI) rasters in an output directory based on input vector ROI, resolution and projection. — createDomain
code: if (FALSE) { library(terra) region <- vect("park.gpkg") createDomain(region, res=30, proj="EPSG:3308",outdir="./output",quiet=FALSE) }
